etymology.description: Combines semantic 言 (yán, 'speech') with phonetic 兌 (duì, 'exchange').
etymology.interpretation: This character intuitively represents the act of exchanging words or speech, highlighting the connection between speaking and communication.
etymology.simplification: The character was simplified by reducing the component 言 to its abbreviated form 讠 for easier writing.

examples.chinese: 他说了很多(他說了很多)。
